dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6729 IH: Allied Partnership and Port Modernization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moylan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To permit the use of NATO and major non-NATO ally dredge ships in the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Allied Partnership and Port Modernization Act.

subsection.text: Section 55109 of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by inserting or (c) after subsection (b);
by redesignating subsection (c) as subsection (d); and
by inserting after subsection (b) the following:
A vessel described in paragraph (2) may engage in dredging in the navigable waters of the United States.
A vessel described in this paragraph is a vessel—

subparagraph.text: documented under the laws of a country that is a member of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization;
built by a country that is a member of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization or a major non-NATO ally (as defined in section 2350a(i) of title 10); and
for which a majority of the owners and operators of the vessel are entities incorporated in a country that is a member of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.

subsection.header: Excluding dredged material from transportation requirements

paragraph.text: Section 55110 of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the section heading, by striking or dredged material and inserting (excluding dredged material); and
by striking or dredged material and inserting (excluding dredged material).

paragraph.text: The analysis for chapter 551 of title 46, United States Code, is amended by striking the item relating to section 55110 and inserting the following:

toc.toc-entry: Sec. 55110. Transportation of valueless material (excluding dredged material).
